name: Red Roof Inn Cleveland Middleburg Heights

reviews.text: i was traveling with my small child and fealt very welcomed at all points of my stay. rooms were really well maintained and clean. i will absalutley be returning to this inn, in my future visits to cleveland.
reviews.title: outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well kept facility. Enter thru Friendly's parking lot off of Bagley or look for entrance off of Engle. Everything worked, beds were a bit soft/saggy for me, had trouble sleeping at times. Could hear water running through pipes once in a while. Easy access to I-71, can walk to Denny's and Friendly's. At registration check in you learn that you may ask to have the safe charge taken off at check out. Only 1 small trash can in room. Sidewalk cement showing some wear (crumbling). Overall, a budget motel that I'd stay at again for the right price.
reviews.title: Decent value for the money

reviews.text: Was very quiet and very clean. The staff was EXTREMELY nice and very, very professional. Greeeeat bang for the buck!
reviews.title: Unbelievably Peaceful with Greeeeeat, Kind Staff

reviews.text: I'm a long distance semi driver who stays out for for 30 days at a time.When I take time off,(4 days)I stay At red roof in Middleburg Heghts,Ohio.It's just minutes from the Ohio Turnpike(I-80),It's clean,well maintained&modern.On the rare occasions I pass thru unexpectly,they go the Extra mile to get me a checked in A.S.A.P.The personable people,the free internet&& the local restaurants make this my best stop in 48 states,Kevin1564@gmail.com
reviews.title: Tired of Truckin'

reviews.text: The staff was very friendly. The king room I had was clean and very suitable for my needs. When I needed extra towels I received them within minutes. I will definetly stay at this Red Roof the next time I'm in Cleveland
reviews.title: Great Place to stay if you need to be in the Cleveland area

reviews.text: Here's what we got for $69/night. Two double (not queen) beds in an immaculately clean room. Clean bathroom. Free high-speed internet. No weird smells or scary guests. Air conditioner was a bit noisy. Deadbolt was broken on the door, but we were too tired to switch rooms. When I reported it the next morning, they were anxious to get it fixed right away.
reviews.title: For the price, it's just fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I made last minute reservations for only $40. The room smelled clean, everything was clean and neat. The bed was comfortable, although the pillows weren't good. I only stay for a night but I really liked it. Free Wi-Fi, microwave, Free coffee on the lobby. etc. I have paid almost 300 a night in hotels in other cities that are not too much more than this, so Im really happy what I paid here.
reviews.title: Very Good for the Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Two things that I didn't like and are really not a big of a deal, but just to make an honest review.
reviews.title: Still a great deal

reviews.text: 1. There was no icemaker machine on the floor where my room was. (Not a biggie)
reviews.title: Good stay, fair price

reviews.text: 2. When you walked in the hotel and the hallway smells really strongly like cigarettes. Yet the bedroom smelled clean. But again as long the room smelled nice I was ok with it.
reviews.title: First time @ a Red Roof - and would stay again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk gentleman, Rodney, was very friendly and efficient in checking me in. I felt like he was anticipating my arrival. The room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel is conveniently located close to the turnpike and has many nice restaurant options to choose from. Thank you for a very nice stay!
reviews.title: More than expected...Great experience!

reviews.text: A colleague and I were in town for business. One night. Our job was near the Best Buy in Strongsville. Just next to our job was a Quality Inn. They wanted almost double the price of the Red Roof Inn. The Red Roof Inn is only 5 minutes tops from the Strongsville Best Buy at the mall. It is by far a much better place to stay. The beds are comfortable, the rooms and facilities are clean, staff is friendly and the location is very convenient to attractions in the area. Great place to stay.
reviews.title: Good Place! Trip Advisor Review Correct Again

reviews.text: the red roof on bagley road @i-71 is a great place to stay. staff was very generous and helpful. rooms were like brand new.i would definately stay there again.
reviews.title: stay at the roof

reviews.text: Very clean and neat room. I have stayed at some other Red Roofs, but this one was by far the best. Staff was curtious and quick. Free Wi/Fi an added bonus. Have stayed in other hotels in the area, but I will only return to this one in the future.
reviews.title: Blown away

reviews.text: I had made a reservation at a hotel in No. Olmsted only to read reviews that it stunk. Last minute change was to this Red Roof. We have stayed at other hotels in the area in the past so knew this was a good area. Room was bigger than expected, very clean, blanket was half sheeted and pillows were OK. Bathroom was clean and without mold. Water was hot. Remember though there is no breakfast and this is a bare bones hotel which means no hairdryer either but you can borrow one. Bed was OK. Where ever I go, I check first for bedbugs and there was no sign of them on either bed. Staff was very nice, efficient and polite. A/C is a bit noisy
reviews.title: clean and neat, and the price is right

reviews.text: I have stayed in quite a few Red Roof Inns. This one is the absolute best in cleanliness, professionalism and hospitality. After my experience at the Toledo Red Roof...I vowed never to stay at another. This one keeps my hopes up!
reviews.title: AWESOME!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Front desk representative Rodney was courteous and professional. Rodney greeted us with a smile and a warm hello. He answered all of our questions and got us checked in right way. The hotel was very clean. We stayed in a King room and it was spotless, even the bathroom! This is a rare exeperience for us in hotels. We had requested to be in a room away from the elevator, which is exactly what we got. It was a nice quiet, restful night's sleep....comfortable beds too! We will definitely stay at this property again.
reviews.title: Fantastic Experience at the Red Roof Inn Cleveland Middleburg Heights!!

reviews.text: This hotel is located in a very nice area within walking distance to many restaurants, close to a metropark and freeway acessible, The staff was very friendly and efficient. the room was very clean, quiet and comfortable, The bathroom was also very clean, i would definitley stay at this Red Roof Inn again!!
reviews.title: Great value, very clean.Great staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We attended the Irish Festival and this hotel was perfect. The rooms were super clean and the staff was very outgoing and friendly. The hotel is located close to everything. We felt very safe in the area walking to the festival.
reviews.title: Great Irish Experience

reviews.text: This hotel was perfect for a good nights rest It was very clean and well kept. The rooms were much larger than I expected. free wireless internet was a surprise. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Simply Perfect

aka: Red Roof Inn Cleveland Middleburg Heights Hotel Middleburg Heights
